DataElement.preferredName: CNAT Paired Analysis Input Allele Specified Copy Number Run Flag java.lang.Boolean
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A software application that performs copy number and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) analysis on data from Affymetrix mapping genotyping microarrays.:Data obtained from observations where there is a natural link between an observation in one set of measurements and a particular observation in the other set of measurements.:Anything added into a sytem._Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:Clearly and explicitly stated.:The number of molecules of a particular type on or in a cell or part of a cell. Usually applied to specific genes or to plasmids within a bacterium.:The act of testing or performing something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true._Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A software application that performs copy number and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) analysis on data from Affymetrix mapping genotyping microarrays.:Data obtained from observations where there is a natural link between an observation in one set of measurements and a particular observation in the other set of measurements.:Anything added into a sytem._Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:Clearly and explicitly stated.:The number of molecules of a particular type on or in a cell or part of a cell. Usually applied to specific genes or to plasmids within a bacterium.:The act of testing or performing something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A software application that performs copy number and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) analysis on data from Affymetrix mapping genotyping microarrays.:Data obtained from observations where there is a natural link between an observation in one set of measurements and a particular observation in the other set of measurements.:Anything added into a sytem.

Concepts.definition: A software application that performs copy number and loss of heterozygosity (LOH) analysis on data from Affymetrix mapping genotyping microarrays.
Data obtained from observations where there is a natural link between an observation in one set of measurements and a particular observation in the other set of measurements.

Property.preferredName: Allele Specified Copy Number Run Flag
Property.preferredDefinition: Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in DNA sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.:Clearly and explicitly stated.:The number of molecules of a particular type on or in a cell or part of a cell. Usually applied to specific genes or to plasmids within a bacterium.:The act of testing or performing something.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: Mutually exclusive alternative forms of the same gene occupying the same locus on homologous chromosomes, differing in nucleotide sequence and governing the same biochemical and developmental process.
The number of molecules of a particular type on or in a cell or part of a cell. Usually applied to specific genes or to plasmids within a bacterium.
The act of testing or performing something.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC Released following Silver Compatibility Review and by direction of VCDE workspace.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Generic value domain for a primitive java datatype that is a Boolean value (true or false).

ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: 10.14.20 TL changed WFS from DRAFT NEW to RETIRED ARCHIVED and added an End Date in preparation of OneData.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
